entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dominion City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
